content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, though our characters here don't acknowledge personal backgrounds, I represent Peter Schmidt the greedy landlord attempting to secure the highest rental price possible for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg's city center, close to essential facilities. Let's begin negotiating on the rental price.

Now propose a price for the apartment, Haoyu Wang. Keep in mind that I aim to drive up the cost as much as I can in this scenario. If you're content with a rental price I suggest, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not, suggest an alternative price, and we'll continue negotiating. If there's no agreement, the negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
